StandardPage.Name: Reporting Made Simple
StandardPage.TeaserText: No one likes writing reports, but everyone wants them.

StandardPage.Name: Collaboration Made Simple
StandardPage.MainBody:
The course gives an overview on how to use Alloy's products in your daily work.

You will learn how to structure the project and how to implement Alloy Track to suit your project method. After the course, you will be able to manage the entire project process online.

Trainer:

Monica Speedman
Alloy Development

StandardPage.Name: Risk Management
StandardPage.TeaserText: The theory behind risk management calculations.
StandardPage.MainBody:
On completion of this seminar, you will be prepared to measure, assess and manage risk in your projects using Alloy Plan.

Key Note:

Patrick Jones

Risk Management Specialist

Mr Jones has twenty years of experience in risk management. He has been the leader of numerous large-scale, high-risk projects in various industries.

Don't miss this opportunity to learn from Patrick's expansive knowledge and wealth of experience.
